scripts.android-build-release: cd ../.. && npm run action cordova/build android -- --buildMode release && cd src/beepass-ui && npm run android-convert-release-aab-to-universal-apk
scripts.android-convert-release-aab-to-universal: rm -f ../../platforms/android/app/build/outputs/bundle/release/app-release.apks && java -jar bundletool-all-1.8.2.jar build-apks --mode=universal --bundle=../../platforms/android/app/build/outputs/bundle/release/app-release.aab --output=../../platforms/android/app/build/outputs/bundle/release/app-release.apks --ks=$BEEPASS_ANDROID_KEYSTORE --key-pass=pass:$BEEPASS_ANDROID_KEYPASS --ks-key-alias=$BEEPASS_ANDROID_KEYALIAS --ks-pass=pass:$BEEPASS_ANDROID_STOREPASS && unzip -o ../../platforms/android/app/build/outputs/bundle/release/app-release.apks -d ../../platforms/android/app/build/outputs/bundle/release && mv ../../platforms/android/app/build/outputs/bundle/release/universal.apk ../../platforms/android/app/build/outputs/bundle/release/app-release.apk
scripts.ios-build-debug: cd ../.. && npm run action cordova/build ios
scripts.ios-build-release: cd ../.. && npm run action cordova/build ios -- --buildMode release
scripts.dev-android-build-debug: source .env.macos-dev-android && cd ../.. && npm run action cordova/build android
scripts.dev-android-build-release: source .env.macos-dev-android && cd ../.. && npm run action cordova/build android -- --buildMode release && cd src/beepass-ui && npm run android-convert-release-aab-to-universal-apk
scripts.dev-android-check-openjdk: if [ ! -d "$(brew --prefix)/opt/openjdk@11" ]; then brew install openjdk@11; fi
scripts.dev-android-install-sdk: source .env.macos-dev-android && [[ $(sdkmanager --list_installed | grep -c 'build-tools;30.0.3\|platforms/android-31') != '2' ]] && echo 'Installing required Android SDK and build tools:' && sdkmanager 'build-tools;30.0.3' 'platforms;android-31' || true
scripts.dev-windows-build-debug: run-s dev-prepare && cd ../.. && OUTLINE_DEBUG=true npm run action electron/build windows && cd src/beepass-ui && run-s dev-windows-copy-build
scripts.dev-windows-build-release: run-s dev-prepare && cd ../.. && npm run action electron/build windows -- --buildMode release && cd src/beepass-ui && run-s dev-windows-copy-build
scripts.macos-build-debug: cd ../.. && npm run action cordova/build macos
scripts.macos-build-release: cd ../.. && npm run action cordova/build macos --buildMode release
scripts.postinstall: if [ ! -d '../../node_modules' ]; then echo 'Installing outline-client node_modules'; cd '../../'; npm ci; else echo 'outline-client node_modules already installed'; fi
